ARABIC: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: remaining in them timelessly, for ever and ever. Truly there is an immense reward with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Which they will enjoy for ever. Indeed God has greater rewards with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Therein they shall abide forever. Surely with Allah a mighty reward awaits them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The reward that God will bestow on His servants is the greatest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will abide in it for ever and ever; indeed with Allah is the great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will dwell therein forever. Verily, with Allah is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Abiding therein for ever; surely Allah has a Mighty reward with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein to dwell forever and ever; surely with God is a mighty wage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There they will abide for ever. Lo! with Allah there is immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There they will dwell for ever. Truly there is an immense reward with God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As abiders therein for evermore. Verily Allah: with Him is a hire mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: to remain in them forever. With Allah indeed is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will dwell therein for ever. Verily in Allah's presence is a reward, the greatest (of all).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will dwell therein forever. Verily, with Allah is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: where they shall live for ever. The wage with Allah is great indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Abiding therein forever. With God is a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [They will be] abiding therein forever. Indeed, Allah has with Him a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [9:22] therein they shall abide forever (khālidīna is an implied circumstance). Surely with God is a tremendous reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There they will abide for ever) never to die or leave. (Lo! with Allah there is immense reward) an abundant reward to the person who believes in Him.
